short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the chat window straight into your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the ChatGPT chat window straight into your browser. This is a light-weight extension that does exactly one thing: provide ChatGPT inside the side panel of your chrome browser. No bloat and any other shenanigans. 

Default keyboard shortcut is Alt + O but can be of course changed in extension settings.

DISCLAIMER: I do not own any of the provided content and neither collect nor amend any of your data.
